price: Ainsi avons-Nous montré à Abraham le royaume des cieux et de la Terre, afin qu’il fût de ceux qui croient avec conviction.
arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ نُرِيٓ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ مَلَكُوتَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلِيَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُوقِنِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Muhammad Hamidullah
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Muhammad Hamidullah. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wakadhālika nurī ib'rāhīma malakūta al-samāwāti wal-arḍi waliyakūna mina al-mūqinīna
